DOC.brief_summary: To assess the five-year incidence of AMD in a population from the central region of Portugal, previously phenotypically characterized.
DOC.brief_title: Five-year Incidence of Age-related Macular Degeneration in the Central Region of Portugal
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects who participated in the Epidemiologic Coimbra Eye Study (NCT01298674) between 2009 and 2013 will attend a single visit, after giving informed consent.
DOC.criteria: Subjects who participated in the Epidemiologic Coimbra Eye Study (NCT01298674) and that were phenotyped; Subjects capable of understanding the information about the study and to give their informed consent to enter the study; Subjects willing and able to comply with the study procedures. Not applicable
DOC.keyword: Age- Related Macular Degeneration; Diabetic Retinopathy; Glaucoma; Cataract
